to.shell_command: open -a "Finder".app
open -a "Safari".app
open -a "WezTerm".app
open -a "Notes".app
open -a "Calendar".app
open -a "Mail".app
open -a "Reminders".app
open -a "Discord".app
open -a "Telegram".app
open -a "WhatsApp".app

osascript -e '
set prev to the clipboard
set the clipboard to "¬"
tell application "System Events"
  keystroke "v" using command down
  delay 0.1
end tell
set the clipboard to prev'

osascript -e '
set prev to the clipboard
set the clipboard to "←"
tell application "System Events"
